description: Shops can reopen next week as coronavirus lockdown measures are eased, the government says.
title: Coronavirus: Shops to reopen on Isle of Man next week
title_page: Coronavirus: Shops to reopen on Isle of Man next week - BBC News
maintext: He said: "The approach of the Council of Ministers is that we want as far as possible to step out of your home and social lives and trust you to make the right decisions for your circumstances."
